Kanhchana and her husband are garment workers. She is asking for her first loan in the amount of $600 to purchase one cow to raise. She will get extra income from selling the cow for beef or by selling the calf when the cow has a baby.

loans.use: to buy a cow to raise.

loans.name: Chhengheun

texts.en:
Chhengheun (in the photo) is 31 years old. Her husband Sao is 34 years old. They live in a village about 27 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1998 and have three children: one son and two daughters. All of their children are in school.    

Chhengheun sells fish that her husband catches. In addition, they also grow rice when rice farming season comes. Chhengheun is asking for her first loan in the amount of 150 USD. She will use the loan, along with her own money, to buy a water pumping machine to spray her farm.

loans.use: To buy a water pumping machine

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is 50 years old and lives in her own house. She sells tea leaves door-to-door. She is a widow and therefore the breadwinner in her home. 

Chizi has been in business for over 20 years and has gained much experience in making sales. She has many customers who prefer the quality of her product, the good prices that she offers, and the excellent service that she provides. She is an active woman who is dedicated to her work and has the drive to succeed. 

Chizi always expects that there will be opportunities that will help her pursue her dreams. She wants to have a more prosperous future, so she is willing to work hard in order to be successful.

Demand has increased within the past few weeks, so Chizi is requesting a loan from Yehu so that she can invest in the purchase of a sack of tea leaves. She has good payment references and impeccable character. She says that she will repay her debt according to the established terms and hopes to provide her family a full life.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of tea leaves.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy tools and furniture for her husband's barber shop.

loans.name: Mahfirat

texts.ru: Махфирату 29 лет. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Махфират работает учительницей в средней школе и получает маленькую зарплату. Eе зарплата не хватает на проживания и поэтому она решила организовать собственный бизнес для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она хочет организовать бизнес изготовлением и продажей лепешек. От полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условия проживания. Ее муж будет помогать ей в ведении бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 15000 сомони для покупки муки, угля и т.п., чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mahfirat is 29 years old, married, and has no children. Mahfirat is a schoolteacher in a junior high school and earns a low salary. Her earnings are not sufficient to cover her living expenses, so she has decided to establish her own business to improve the living standard of her family. With this goal in mind, she took a course entitled "Get Ahead" that was organized by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she received a certificate. Mahfirat wants to set up a business baking and selling flatbread. She plans to use the income she earns to improve her living conditions. Her husband will assist her in running the business. Mahfirat is asking for a loan of 15,000 Tajikistan Somoni to purchase flour, coal, etc., so that she can set up her business. Mahfirat is waiting for your kind assistance.

loans.use: To buy coal and flour to set up a new business

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is applying for her third loan with KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. Beatrice will use the loan to buy textile materials, thus offering a variety for her customers to choose from. With the anticipated profits from the business, she will educate her children. 

Her hopes and dreams are to open a boutique which will help her improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for her shop.

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San (in the photo) is 32 years old. He and his wife, Baty, who is 30 years old, live in a Phnom Penh suburb. They have been married since 1999 and have three children: one son and two daughters. All of the children are in school. 

San and his wife are garment workers. He is asking for his first loan in the amount of $600 to purchase one cow to raise. He will get extra income from selling the cow for beef or selling the calf when the cow gives a baby.

loans.use: to buy a cow to raise

loans.name: Zebuniso

texts.ru: Зебунисо 36 лет. Она замужем на доброго человека, которого зовут, Собир. Они имеют 2 детей и должны обеспечить их со всеми необходимыми средствами. Зебунисо решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Уже более 1 месяца она занимается собственным бизнесом, шитьем женской одежды. Она хочет развевать новый бизнес, а для этого она должна купить новую швейную машинку. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 700 сомони для покупки швейной машитки, чтобы развевать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zebuniso is 36 years old and is married to a kind man named Sobir. They have 2 children and need to give them all the necessities of life. Zebuniso has decided to help her husband provide for the family's well-being. With that goal in mind, she took a course entitled "Get Ahead" that was organized by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she earned a certificate. For over a month already, Zebuniso has been running her own business sewing women's clothing. She wants to develop her business, but in order to do this, she needs to purchase a new sewing machine. Zebuniso is seeking a loan in the amount of 7,000 Tajikistan Somoni to buy a sewing machine so that she can foster her new business. She is waiting for your kind assistance.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her new business

loans.name: Nyamvula

texts.en:
Nyamvula, 35, is a farmer. Her husband is also a businessman and their combined income covers the family's expenses. They have four children and all are still in school.

Nyamvula grows kale and mchicha (pig weed), crops that provide a steady income. She is applying for a loan that she will use to buy fertilizer, pesticides, etc., as well as for cultivation for her next planting and to protect her crop against insects. The investment will help her maximize her yield and harvest her vegetables for sale. She has been in this activity since 2003 and she says that it has been a good project.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides, etc., as well as for cultivation of her farm

loans.name: Diora

texts.ru: Диёра очень способная и талантливая девушка. Ей 19 лет,  не замужем и студентка 3-го курса Худжадского Государственного Университета по специальности истории. Она успешно справляется и с учебой. Диёра кроме учебы еще занимается домашними делами. Ее мать работает воспитательницей в детском саду, а отец занимается скотоводством. Их доход не позволяет им оплатить за учебы Диёры. Диёра запрашивает займ на сумму 325 долларов США для оплаты учебы в университете. Она надеется на вашу доброту.
texts.en: Diora is a very capable and talented young woman. She is 19 years old, single, and is in the 3rd year of history studies at Khujand State University. She is a very good student. Apart from doing her university courses, Diora helps with household chores. Her mother is a kindergarten teacher and her father works in animal husbandry, but their salaries are not sufficient for them to afford the costs of Diora's education. Diora is seeking a loan in the amount of 325 US dollars to pay for her university studies. She is hoping for your kind assistance.

loans.use: To pay her tuition

loans.name: Tusikilizane Group

texts.fr: La cliente Vumilia est membre de l’association d’affaire Tusikilizane. Elle est âgée de 45 ans et mère de 9 enfants tous scolarisés.  Le credit sollicité va lui servir à l’approvisionnement d’une douzaine des pagnes et 10 caisses des boissons sucrées.  Ainsi elle remercie Hekima infiniment d’avoir encouragé  la  femme  à faible revenue au travail.
texts.en: Vumilia is a member of the business association Tusikilizane. She is 45 years old and the mother of nine children, all of whom are enrolled in school. She plans to use this loan in order to purchase a supply of a dozen pagnes (traditional West African printed cloth garments), and 10 cases of soft drinks. She is incredibly thankful to the organization of Hekima for having encouraged a low-income woman to work for herself.

loans.use: to buy a dozen pagnes (traditional West African printed cloth garments) and 10 cases of soft drinks for resale.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Vuthy

texts.en:
Vuthy (in the photo) is 35 years old and his wife, Sambat, is 32 years old. They have no children yet. The family lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh.

Vuthy and his wife raise pigs at home. He is applying for a loan in the amount of $500 to assist in his pig farming business by buying pig feed.

loans.use: to buy pig feed

loans.name: Naime

texts.en:
As a parent of 11 children, Naime has worked hard to support her family because she was widowed about seventeen years ago. She is in her early sixties and her children’s age range from 44 - 19 years old. She has a livestock business in northern Albania and through this activity she has earned an income that helped her raise all her children.

Naime is borrowing 100,000 Albanian lek through VisionFund Albania to repair her leaky roof before winter starts.

Naime has been sustaining her business activity for the past twenty years, but more aggressively the past eight years. She hopes that this loan will help her attain her dream to repair and renovate her home, while she is seeking lenders understanding.

loans.use: to repair the leaky roof of her little house before winter starts

loans.name: Kaleche

texts.en:
Kaleche is married and has five children. She has always wanted to provide them with a good education, and since her husband's income is not enough to provide the family with a good quality of life, Kaleche decided to start working over ten years ago, buying and selling goats at the market, in order to generate an income with which she can contribute to her home's finances.

Thanks to her increasing number of customers, Kaleche is looking for a loan to buy more goats for sale. In this way she will ensure her family has a good quality of life and better financial opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to buy more goats to resell.

loans.name: Verónica Esmeralda

texts.es:
Verónica tiene 21 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos. Ella tiene 5 años de experiencia en la administración de su propia tienda junto con su mamá, debido a que ellas elaboran tortillas y tienen muchos clientes, fue de esa manera que verónica pensó en instalar una tienda para aprovechar los clientes que llegan a comprar tortillas. De las ganancias que recibe, ella compra lo necesario para sus hijos, pues es su única fuente de ingresos. 

Para comprar los insumos que necesita para su negocio, debe pagar un pick up para que la lleve hasta la ciudad, debido a que no puede trasladarse junto a sus dos hijos pequeños en autobús.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos quintales de fríjol, dos quintales de arroz, maíz, aceite, harinas, entre otros productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda.  De esta manera, ella comprara al por mayor, lo que significara un ahorro en tiempo y dinero, satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes para mantener la fidelidad en ellos. Lo que más desea es ampliar su tienda, para que sus hijos tengan educación, salud y vestuario, cosa que para ella fue muy difícil, pues su mama la creció solo con los ingresos que recibía con la venta de tortillas y tamales.
texts.en:
Verónica is twenty-one years old and is a single mother of two.  She has five years experience managing her own store with her mother.  They make tortillas and have many customers.  This gave Verónica the idea to set up a store and to take advantage of the customers that come to buy tortillas.  From the profits that she receives, she buys what she needs to take care of her children.  This is her only source of income.

To buy the supplies that she needs for her business, she must pay a pick-up truck to take her into the city, since it is difficult to travel with her two small children on the bus.  

The loan that she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy two 100 lb sacks of beans, two 100 lb sacks of rice, corn, oil, flour, and other basic need products to stock her store.  She will buy wholesale items, which will save her time and money and satisfy the needs of her customers, keeping them loyal to her business.

What she wishes for most is to grow her business, so that her children can have an education, good health, and clothes, something that for her, was very difficult; Verónica's mother raised her with only the income she received from selling tortillas and tamales.

loans.use: to buy two 100 lb sacks of beans, two 100 lb sacks of rice, corn, oil, flour, and other basic need products to stock her store.

loans.name: Shahboz

texts.ru: Шахбоз родился 1990 года. В 1997 году поступил в школу и в 2008 году успешно окончил. После окончания школы он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Университет факультет менеджмента. Данное время перешел на 5 курс. Он очень способный молодой человек. Шахбоз увлекается спортом и в свободное время читает зарубежную литературу. Родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в этом году. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту. Давайте вместе поможем молодому специалисту окончить университет и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en: Shahboz was born in 1990. He began his schooling in 1997 and successfully completed it in 2008. Upon graduation, he entered the Faculty of Management of Tajikistan State University and is currently in his 5th year of studies there. Shahboz is a very capable young man. He enjoys sports and spends his free time reading foreign literature. Shahboz's parents are not in a position to pay for his university fees this year, so Shahboz is seeking a loan to cover his education costs. He is waiting for your kind assistance. Let's work together to help this young specialist finish university and to use his knowledge in the future.

loans.use: To pay his tuition

loans.name: Sophen

texts.en:
Sophen (in the photo) and her husband run a private water utility service. They built a water storage tower and have connected it to houses in the neighborhood. In addition, her husband is a fisherman. And they also grow rice, vegetables and lotus when farming season comes. 

Sophen and her husband live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have six children: three sons and three daughters. Two are married, two are garment factory workers and the other two attend school. 

Sophen had applied for a Kiva loan one time already. She is now asking for her second loan in the amount of $600 to assist in her farming business by buying lotus seed and fertilizer.

loans.use: to assist in her farming business by buying lotus seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Savoeurn

texts.en: Savoeurn (pictured with his pigpen) and his wife, Srey Mom, both 25 years old, have been married since 2009 and have one young son. The family lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh. While his wife is a weaver, Savoeurn raises pig at home. He currently has 13 pigs and 3 sows, and is requesting a loan of $1,500 to buy pig feed.

loans.use: to buy pig feed for his pig-raising business.

loans.name: Victoire Group

texts.fr: Nabintu  est  trésorière dans le groupe de credit  Victoire. Agée de 27 ans est  mariée à un commerçant  et  mère de 2 enfants non encore scolarisé. Elle vend  divers produits vivriers (huile de palme, riz, sel, haricot, pétrole  et du savon) depuis  2009.  Elle compte s’approvisionner en 2 sacs de riz, 1 bidon de 20 litres  d’huile, 1 carton de savon, 1sac de haricot 25kgs  et  1 bidon de pétrole. Son vœu est de construire une maison commerciale.  Elle souhaite à Hekima  la prospérité.
texts.en: Nabintu is the treasurer of her loan group, which is called "Victoire" (Victory). At 27 years of age, she is married to a businessman and is the mother of two young children who are not yet of school age. She has been selling various food products (palm oil, rice, salt, beans, kerosene and soap) since 2009. With this loan, she hopes to purchase two bags of rice, one 20-liter can of palm oil, one carton of soap, one 25-kilogram sack of beans and one can of kerosene. Nanintu's goal is to build her own home business. She hopes that Hekima will continue to prosper.

loans.use: to purchase various food products for resale.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Nuruila

texts.ru:
Нуруйле 54 года, замужем, воспитывает 3 детей. Нуруйла в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, на протяжении  20 лет занимается полеводством  и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 1,500 сом (KGS ). Благодаря упорному труду Нуруйли в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 5 голов крупного рогатого скота с приплодом, 1 лошадь, ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 6,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуруйла обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота для откорма и перепродажи.  Доходы от кредита Нуруйла  планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса, а в будущем планирует купить квартиру для семьи.
texts.en:
Nuruila is 54 years old, married, and has 3 children at home. As the main breadwinner of the family, for the past 20 years Nuruila has been growing crops and raising cattle. She began this business with a sum of only 1,500 Kyrgyzstan Som (KGS), but thanks to her persistent hard work, her farm now includes 5 head of cattle and their calves, 1 horse, and brings in a monthly income of around 6,000 Som (KGS.) 

Nuruila has approached Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 Som (KGS) for the purpose of developing her business. She wants to buy cattle to fatten and re-sell. Nuruila plans to re-invest the income generated by this loan into her business, and in the future she plans to buy an apartment for her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel tiene 48 años de edad, es divorciado y tiene cuatro hijos. Toda su vida se ha dedicado al cultivo de granos básicos y lo aprendió de su padre quien también era agricultor. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar pesticidas, fertilizantes y todo lo necesario para obtener un excelente cultivo de maíz. Al preparar bien el cultivo, tendrá más producción y mejores ventas, para que sus ingresos mejoren y cubrir las necesidades del hogar. Desea mejorar el piso, techo y paredes de su vivienda y comprar una vaca para comercializar con leche y sus derivados.
texts.en:
Miguel is 48 years old, is divorced and has four children. All his life, he has worked cultivating basic grains, which he learned from his father who also worked in agriculture.

The loan that he is asking for from Fundación Campo is to purchase pesticides, fertilizers, and everything else that is necessary to have a good harvest of corn. By preparing well for the harvest, he will have more production and more sales, so that his sales increase and cover the necessities for his home. He wants to improve the floor, ceiling and walls of his house and buy a cow in order to sell its milk and its derivatives.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides, fertilizers, and everything else that is necessary to have a good harvest of corn.

loans.name: Rita Johana

texts.es:
Rita, es una humilde comerciante, originaria de Boaco, casada, madre de dos hijos de 13 y 6 años de edad, ambos están en la escuela.  
Inicio vendiendo enchiladas y pasteles de manera ambulante, luego se trasladó al mercado a vender comida pero el lugar no era muy atractivo y tenía buenas condiciones por eso decidió cambiarse de lugar.  Hoy en día vende comida, gaseosa, pan y refrescos naturales. Ella tiene como expectativa hacer crecer su negocio, captar más clientes, desea acondicionar mejor su puesto de comida comprando más sillas y mesas de plástico. Solicita el financiamiento para comprar arroz, azúcar, carne, aceite, verduras, frijoles, queso, servilletas. Esto le ayudara a tener más ingredientes para trabajar. Pues su fuente de inspiración para esforzarse más son sus hijos a los cuales desea brindarlos un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Rita is a humble merchant, originally from Boaco. She is married, a mother of two children of 13 and 6 years of age. Both children are in school. She started selling enchiladas and cakes by travelling to different neighborhoods, later transitioning into a market to sell food but the location wasn't very attractive and didn't have good conditions for this, so she decided to change her location. Today, she sells food, beverages, bread, and natural sodas. She wants to increase the size of her business, to gain more customers, and wants to better furnish her location by buying more chairs and plastic tables. She is asking for the loan in order to buy rice, sugar, meat, oil, vegetables, beans, cheese, and napkins. This helps her to have more ingredients to work with. Her source of inspiration to work hard are her children, to whom she wants to bring a better future.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, meat, oil, vegetables, beans, cheese, and napkins.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.ru:
Виктория уже несколько раз пользовалась услугами КИВА. Благодаря своевременно полученной финансовой помощи ее бизнес не только удержался на плаву, но и постепенно развивался и рос. Она переехала на новое место торговли, на том же рынке, где работала и раньше. Теперь торговля стало более бойкой.  
В этот раз Виктория обратилась за кредитом в размере 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить пуховики для продажи в холодный осенне-зимний период. Благодаря тому, что она увеличит товарооборот, ей придется меньше ездить в поездки за оптовыми закупками товара, что сократит ее расходы и трату времени. Виктория подумывает о том, чтобы разработать свой сайт и начать торговать своим товаром также и через интернет, что сегодня становится все более популярным и в Украине.
texts.en: Victoria has used Kiva services several times already.  Thanks to the timely obtained financial help, her business not only stayed afloat, but gradually developed and grew.  She moved to a new retail location at the same market, where she previously worked.  Now, her sales have increased more.  This time, Victoria requested a loan in the amount of 10,000 hryvnia to purchase puffer jackets for sale during the cold autumn-winter period.  Thanks to the fact that she will increase her goods turnover, she would have to travel less for wholesale merchandise purchases, which would also decrease her expenses and wasted time.  Victoria is thinking about developing a website and starting to sell her merchandise also through the Internet, which today is becoming more popular in Ukraine.

loans.use: to purchase puffer jackets for sale during the cold autumn-winter period

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, age 52, is a farmer in Nkubu County in Kenya. She lives with one child, age 14, who is enrolled in school. Josephine has been engaged in farming for 20 years, and her farm produces milk, fruits, and vegetables, all of which she sells locally.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 40,000 KES in order to buy materials for constructing a zero grazing unit for her dairy cows. This will help increase milk production and thereby improve her income, which will enable her to pay school fees for her child. Josephine also aspires to build residential houses in the near future, a venture that will provide an additional source of income that will help to boost her family's standard of living.

Josephine's main challenges in farming are crop failure, pests, and diseases.

She is grateful for Juhudi Kilimo and calls it the best micro-finance institution for small-scale farmers.

loans.use: to buy materials for constructing a zero grazing unit for her dairy cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy primary materials like wood, lacquer, sandpaper and others for furniture making as well as to buy construction materials to remodel and expand his workshop.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталья живет и работает в Новой Каховке. Она торгует женской одеждой на одном из местных рынков. В этой сфере проработала уже 17 лет, имеет хороший опыт подхода к клиентам, у нее есть свой круг постоянных клиентов. На данный момент у нее нет своей торговой площади – она арендует землю у администрации торгового центра.
Наталья обратилась за дополнительной финансовой помощью в размере 10 000 гривен, потому что она запланировала закупку осенне-зимней женской одежды под реализацию, а именно хочет приобрести брюки, куртки, юбки, свитера и кофты на холодный сезон.
texts.en: Natalya lives and works in Novaya Kahovka.  She sells women's clothing at one of the local markets.  She has been working in this field for 17 years, has a good experience of dealing with customers and has her own circle of regular customers.  Currently, she does not have her own retail space.  She leases land from the shopping center administration.  Natalya requested an additional financial help in the amount of 10,000 hryvnia because she planned to purchase women's autumn-winter clothing for resale and primarily wants to purchase pants, jackets, skirts, sweaters and cardigans for the cold season.

loans.use: to purchase women's autumn-winter clothing, such as pants, jackets, skirts, sweaters and cardigans, for resale

loans.name: Rukia

texts.en:
Rukia has been selling home products for several years. She is thankful for this business that has equipped her with entrepreneurial skills. Three months ago, Rukia opened a vegetable stall that is doing well. She sells fruits and vegetables at the market.

Rukia is a very hard-working woman. She says she has always worked, and that she is not afraid of challenges. Her goal is to be able to continue growing her business and have a bigger stall to continue helping her family and her husband.

Rukia is coming to Yehu and Kiva to ask for another loan so that she can buy vegetables including tomatoes, green peppers, carrots, and onions, as well as seasonal fruit. This will allow her to supply her business with high quality products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables including tomatoes, green peppers, carrots, and onions as well as seasonal fruit

loans.name: Justus

texts.en:
Justus is 34 years old and married, with three children.  He does farming to earn a living.  He has been farming for four years and has employed one person.  He mainly grows tomatoes and maize in his farm.  

Justus has requested a loan of KES 72,000 to buy seedlings and a motorbike.  Since Justus joined Faulu Kenya, he has grown his business and left his permanent job and become self-employed.

Justus hopes to expand his farm in the future.

loans.use: To buy seedlings and a motorbike.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: Nelly, de 58 años, es una mujer buena, honesta y muy amable, está divorciada y tiene una hija de 17 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su familia conformada por sus hermanas y sobrinas, es por ellos por quienes sigue adelante y trabajando arduamente. La actividad principal de Nelly consiste en la preparación de potajes y alimentos variados, ella posee éste gran don y es conocida como una de las mujeres que tiene la sazón más exquisita en la ciudad, es por eso que su restaurante es uno de los más concurridos de la zona ya que sus clientes acuden a diario hacia ella para degustar los deliciosos menús que prepara con tanto esmero y cariño. Desde muy pequeña a sentido ésta gran pasión por el arte culinario y con el tiempo ha venido desarrollando su capacidad y sus sentidos para mejorar su sazón y ahora sabe y conoce rápidamente cual es el mejor sabor que su clientela prefiere; aún recuerda  con nostalgia pero con mucho orgullo como se inició en éste trabajo hace 30 años cuando soñaba con tener su propio restaurante ya que a través del paso del tiempo ha visto como su esfuerzo y constancia por consolidarse en el mercado laboral le ha dado frutos y logros que ahora puede disfrutar. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es preparar sus potajes, disfrutar de los aromas y sabores y saber que sus fieles comensales disfrutan de cada platillo que ofrece, espera continuar con el mejoramiento de la infraestructura de su restaurante e implementarlo con algunos detalles de menajería. Este es el crédito número 16 con MFP, por tanto agradece a quienes hacen posible su crédito para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado está muy comprometida una vez más a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas como lo hizo en anteriores créditos que tuvo, está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son muy buenos, amables y solidarios. Con los S/.4000 solicitados, comprará ingredientes que utiliza a diario para preparar los alimentos, ya que la demanda por su comida ha aumentado, además comprará materiales de construcción para mejorar las condiciones de su local y ampliarlo un poco más.
texts.en:
Nelly is 58 years old and a good, honest, and friendly woman.  She’s divorced, has a 17 year old daughter and lives in a home of her own with her family that includes her sisters and nieces.  They are the reasons she continues ahead and works hard.  Nelly prepares stews and various foods, has a great talent, and is known as one of the women with the tastiest spices in town.  This is why her restaurant is one of the most well-known in the zone and why her customers go there daily to enjoy the tasty menus that she prepares with care and love.

She’s had a passion for the culinary arts since she was young, and in time she has developed her capacity and sense for improving her spices.  Now she knows the tastes that her customers prefer and she remembers how she began this work 30 years ago with fondness and pride.  She dreamed of having her own restaurant and with time she has seen her efforts pay off and she’s gotten benefits that she can now enjoy.

What she enjoys most about her work is preparing the stews, enjoying the smells and tastes, and knowing that her loyal customers enjoy each dish that she offers.  She hopes to continue improving her restaurant’s infrastructure.

This will be her 16th loan through MFP and she appreciates those who make this loan possible so that she can continue toward her goals.  She is also very committed to making her payments on time, as she has done with previous loans.  She is happy to belong to the communal bank because all of the members are good, friendly and united.

She will use the 4,000 PEN from this loan to buy ingredients that she uses daily, now that the demand for her food has increased.  She will also buy building supplies to expand and improve the conditions in her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and building materials.

loans.name: Emelina

texts.es:
La señora Emelina tiene 61 años de edad, tiene tres nietos. Ella se dedica al cultivo junto con sus nietos, desde que murió su compañero de vida, fue él quien le enseño esa actividad. Hoy en día ella trata de enseñarles a sus nietos. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. a prepararles el desayuno, luego alista su ropa para enviarlos a la escuela; mientras ella se queda en la casa realizando las tareas del hogar y a preparar el almuerzo. A las 2:00 p.m. se trasladan al lugar donde tienen la milpa hasta las 5:00 p.m. o 6:00 p.m. para luego regresar a su casa. Ella comenta que trabaja mucho para ayudar a sus nietos, debido a que la mamá de ellos trabaja como empleada domestica y su papá los abandono. 

Para comprar los insumos que necesita, debe caminar a pie durante treinta minutos, para luego abordar el autobús que la conduce al lugar en donde compra los insumos, el viaje en autobús también dura treinta minutos. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para escriturar un terreno que le heredo su papá, construir una galera para la cocina, para comprar tres sacos de abono y un litro de herbicidas. Así, no tendrá miedo que le puedan quitar su terreno, con la construcción de la galera evitara que la casa se le llene de humo y aplicara a sus cultivos el abono que necesitan para que sus frutos sean buenos. Su deseo, es que sus nietos estudien para que sean hombres y mujeres de bien, construir su casita de ladrillo ya que en la que viven es de lámina.
texts.en:
Mrs. Emelina is 61 years old, she has three grandchildren. She cultivates the land together with her grandchildren since her life partner died; it was him who taught her that line of work. She now tries to teach her grandchildren. She wakes up at 5:00 am and makes them breakfast. She then gets their clothes ready and sends them to school. She stays home and takes care of the household chores and prepares lunch. At 2:00 pm she goes to the plantation and she stays until 5:00 or 6:00 pm and then comes back home. She mentions that she works a lot in order to help her grandchildren, because their mother works as a housekeeper and their father abandoned them.
 
In order to buy the supplies she needs, she must walk for thirty minutes and then get on the bus that takes her to the place where she buys the supplies. The bus trip takes also thirty minutes. The loan she is requesting to Fundación Campo is for buying three bags of fertilizer and a liter of herbicides, building a shed for the kitchen and for registering on public record a piece of land she inherited from her father. With this, she will not be afraid of somebody taking her land away, with the construction of the shed the smoke will not enter the house and she will spread the fertilizers that her crops need for its fruits to be good.

Her wish is that her grandchildren study and grow to be men and women with good values and to be able to build a brick house, because the one they now live in is made of corrugated metal.

loans.use: to buy three bags of fertilizer and a liter of herbicides, to register on public record a piece of land she inherited from her father and to build a shed for the kitchen.

loans.name: Munojatkhon

texts.ru: Муночатхон молодая и очень энергичная девушка. Ей 20 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. С детства она помогала маме продавать продовольственные товары и поэтому у нее большой опыт в бизнесе. Муночатхон заочно учится в полицейской школе. Она планирует организовать собственный бизнес.  С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат.  Она хочет организовать бизнес  купле продажей   полотенце,  покрывало, простынь и т.п. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 15000 сомони для покупки товара, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Munojatkhon is a young and very energetic woman.  She is 20 years old, single and lives with her parents.  Since childhood, she has been helping her mother to sell food products, and this is why she has a lot of experience in business.  Munojatkhon attends a police academy part-time.  She plans to organize her own business.  With this goal in mind, she completed the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women, and obtained a certificate.  She wants to start a business of buying and selling towels, bed covers, sheets and the like.  Munojatkhon is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 somoni to purchase the merchandise, needed to start the new business.  She relies on your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase the merchandise, needed to start the new business

loans.name: Madel

texts.en:
This is Madel.  She previously obtained a loan of PHP 11,000 that she used to buy spare parts and cover maintenance costs for her computer shop. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another PHP 15,000  loan to buy more parts and cover more maintenance costs. 

Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Madel dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work running her business. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of their work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for computer parts and maintenance needed in her business.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 33 years old and married to Pauline.  He is a father of three.

Paul operates a taxi in Kangemi and has been doing so for four years now.  He earns a monthly income of KES 30,000.

He is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD.  He plans to buy new spare wheels for his taxi. In the future, he wants to open a tour company in Kenya.

loans.use: To buy new spare wheels for his taxi.

loans.name: Fredy Rosbil

texts.es: Fredy Rosbil de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida Vilma y sus tres hijas, él se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, tomates, cebollas, chiles, plátanos, naranjas, sandias entre otros, posee dos puestos en diferentes lugares de la zona donde reside, es muy conocido pues tiene amplia experiencia en las vendas, tiene el producto mas fresco, los mejores precios y además un excelente servicio; Fredy es un hombre entregado a su labor, enérgico y muy luchador siempre esta buscando las mejores alternativas que le abran camino al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y como todo buen comerciante quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión que le genere ganancias pero para ello necesita de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tomates, cebollas, chiles, sandias, plátanos, etc. Fredy Rosbil tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Fredy Rosbil, 43, lives with his life companion, Vilma, and their three daughters.  He works selling fruit and vegetables: tomatoes, onions, chilies, bananas, oranges and watermelons, among others.  He has two stands in different places in the zone he lives in.  He’s very well-known because he has ample sales experience.  

Fredy’s a man who is very dedicated to his work; he’s energetic and very tenacious and is always looking for better ways to open a road to success.  Demand has increased in recent weeks and like all good merchants he wants to take advantage of this and make a new investment that will generate profits but needs capital to back him up in order to do so  which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy tomatoes, onions, chilies, watermelons, bananas, etc.  Fredy Rosbil has good payment references and is sure to be able to repay the loan while at the same time trusts that he will provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, chilies, watermelons and bananas.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María, 51 años de edad, madre de dos hijos , de oficio comerciante, se dedica a vender comida y atender una pulpería , no tiene estudios primarios, pero si es una mujer que sabe luchar por su familia. Empezó a vender comida en los mercados municipales fue ahorrando para poner una pulpería lo cual logro hacerlo. Gracias a estas actividades es que ha podido sobrevivir junto con su familia. 
Está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar arroz, azúcar, papel higiénico, jugos, pan, enlatados, aceite. Pues son productos que más requieren sus clientes y que son de mucha necesidad. Su idea es abastecer su pulpería de más variedad de productos que son muy necesarios en el consumo familiar de su clientela. En  la medida de lo posible también desea ir mejorando la infraestructura de su humilde casita.
texts.en:
María, 51, is the mother of two children; she’s a merchant by occupation.  She sells food and manages a grocery store.  She did not attend elementary school but she is a woman who knows how to fight for her family.  She started out selling food in the municipal markets and saved up until she was able to open a grocery store and succeeded in doing so.  Thanks to these activities she’s been able to survive along with her family.

She needs financing to buy rice, sugar, toilet paper, juices, bread, canned goods and oil because they are the products most in demand by her customers and that are very much needed.  Her idea is to stock her grocery store with a wider variety of products that are very necessary for her customers’ family consumption.  She’d like to gradually improve her humble abode’s infrastructure as much as possible.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Irma Suyapa

texts.es: Doña Irma tiene 59 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa junto a una nieta. Ella siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, a la venta de ropa y zapatos, lleva 6 años vendiendo todo tipo de productos naturales y cosméticos, vende cremas, champú, jabón, vitaminas y cosméticos (lápiz labial, base, maquillaje). Estos productos los vende de manera ambulante y por pedidos. Ella ha sido cliente de ODEF por tres ciclos de préstamos con este actual donde ha solicitado 21,000 lempiras, con el cual va comprar más productos naturales de belleza para incrementar las ventas y sus ingresos. Su meta es aumentar su clientela y tener un local fijo para establecer su negocio y de allí ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Irma, 59, is a single mother; she has two children and lives in the municipality of Santa Cruz de Yojoa with a granddaughter.  She’s always been a merchant; she sold shoes and clothes and for the last six years has been selling all types of natural products and cosmetics.  She sells creams, shampoo, soap, vitamins and cosmetics (lipstick, foundation and make-up).  She sells these products from place to place and on order.

She’s been an ODEF client for three loan cycles counting this one for 21,000 Lempiras she will use to buy more natural beauty products to increase sales and income.  Her goal is to increase her clientele and to have a permanent locale in which to set up her business and from there help her family.

loans.use: to buy natural products like creams, soap, vitamins, shampoo and cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Isrrael

texts.es: Isrrael, tiene 30 años de edad, es soltero, vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. El tiene 7 años de haber obtenido un puesto o local en uno de los mercados de la Ciudad para vender cítricos y verduras, vende limones, naranjas, toronjas, mandarinas, naranja acida, aguacates y toda verdura que pueda vender. Isrrael comenzó trabajando como ayudante en el mercado, luego tuvo la oportunidad de  establecer su propio negocio. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 11,000 lempiras y lo va invertir en surtir de productos cítricos y en ampliar el negocio, arreglar las mesas donde coloca el producto. Con esta inversión va tener mayor solvencia y piensa ahorrar para comprar un vehículo.
texts.en:
Isrrael, 30, is single living in the municipality of San Pedro Sula.  He obtained his stand in one of the city markets seven years ago where he sells citrus fruit and vegetables.  He sells lemons, oranges, grapefruit, mandarins, sour oranges, avocadoes and all other vegetables he’s able to sell.  

Isrrael started out working as helper in the market and then got the opportunity of establishing his own business.  The loan he’s requested is for 11,000 Lempiras that he will use to buy citrus fruit and expand the business and to repair the tables he displays his fruit on.  With this investment he will be more solvent and he plans to save up to buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to stock up on fruit and vegetables and also to repair the table he displays them on.

loans.name: Claudia Argentina

texts.es: Claudia, tiene 27 años de edad, casada, tiene 4 hijos y vive en el municipio del Progreso, Yoro. Claudia es muy emprendedora, siempre le ha gustado el comercio, hace un año estableció el negocio en su casa donde vende ropa interior para damas, accesorios, sandalias zapatos, etc. el préstamo que ha solicitado por 10,000 Lempiras lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería como ropa y zapatos de temporada para aumentar el inventario y mejorar sus ventas. Su meta es seguir surtiendo el negocio para ofrecer a los clientes todo tipo de productos y mejorar su nivel de vida familiar.
texts.en: Claudia, 27, is married and has four children; she lives in the municipality of Progreso, Yoro.  Claudia is very enterprising; she’s always enjoyed commerce.  A year ago she started a home-based business where she sells women’s underwear, accessories, sandals, shoes, etc.  The loan she’s requested is for 10,000 Lempiras that she’ll use to buy more merchandise like seasonal clothes and shoes to increase the inventory and improve her sales.  Her goal is to continue stocking the business to offer customers all types of products and to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Baraka Group

texts.fr: La cliente Wabiwa est secrétaire dans le groupe Baraka. Engagée à fonctionnaire de l’Etat, est âgée de 45 ans, mère de 10 enfants  tous  scolarisés. Le credit demandé va lui servir à l’achat des produits divers dont  les sacs de riz, des sucres, des casiers de  boissons alcoolisées et quelques cartons de savon.  Elle remercie Hekima et ses partenaires pour ses actions.
texts.en: The client Wabiwa is the secretary of the Baraka group. Employed as a civil servant, she is 45 years old and mother to 10 children who all go to school. The requested loan will help her to buy diverse products including bags of rice, sugars, cases of alcoholic drinks and several cartons of soap. She thanks Hekima and its partners for their actions.

loans.use: to buy diverse products including bags of rice, sugars, cases of alcoholic drinks and several cartons of soap.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Ukweli Group

texts.fr: La cliente Lopembe, membre du groupe de crédit Ukweli, Femme courageuse, entrepreneur, âgée d'environ 32 ans, mère de 8 enfants. Elle est vendeuse des divers. En plus, elle vend aussi des beignets, Primus, Fanta, etc., à son domicile pour accroitre ses revenus. Son mari est un quincailleur. Elle commença son business vers les années 2003 avec de fonds propres reçu de son mari. Les bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation et scolarité pour ses enfants. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir son 15eme cycle de crédit. Elle travaille dans un contexte très difficile suite à l’insécurité dans la ville. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 5 casiers de Primus, 3 casiers de Fanta, 1 ballon de Friperies, etc. En plus, elle souhaite acheter une parcelle dans le futur. La cliente remercie Hekima pour les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes à faible revenu. Il sied de signaler une cliente porte son bébé
texts.en:
Lopembe is a member of the loan group "Ukweli." She is a courageous woman, an entrepreneur, and the mother of eight children. She is approximately 32 years of age, and is a merchant of various goods. She also sells beignets and bottled drinks (such as Primus and Fanta) from her home to earn supplementary income. Her husband is an ironmonger. Lopembe began her business in 2003 with start up capital she received from her husband. The benefits of her business include building up her savings, and providing food and schooling for their children. She recently completed her 15th loan cycle with Hekima. 

Lopembe works in a very difficult location, due to lack of security in the city. With her most recent loan, she plans to purchase supplies, including five cases of Primus, three cases of Fanta, and one parcel of used clothing, among other things. In addition, Lopembe hopes to earn enough income to buy a plot of land in the future.

Lopembe is very thankful to Hekima for their aid in the empowerment of poor women with low incomes. The group would like to note that one of their members is currently expecting a child.

loans.use: to purchase five cases of Primus, three cases of Fanta, three cases of Mitsing, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Dénis

texts.fr: Informaticien de profession, mr denis âgé de 30ans a pour femme une revendeuse. En plus de sa formation, il vend des livres chrétiens à toutes personnes. Afin d’augmenter son stock, il demande un prêt à WAGES pour acheter de la marchandise. Avec les profits réalisés, il voudrait assurer le bien –être de la famille et rendre pérenne son activité.
texts.en: Computer scientist by profession, Denis is 30 years old and his wife is a reseller. In addition to his training, he sells Christian books to everyone. In order to increase his stock, he is requesting a loan from WAGES to buy merchandise. With the profits, he would like to ensure the well-being of his family and make his business sustainable.

loans.use: to buy books.

loans.name: Tchamié

texts.fr: Père 03 enfants dont 01 scolarisé, tchamié est un jeune homme de 27ans. Pour bien jouer son rôle de père de famille, il exerce comme activité génératrice de revenu de l’huile à moteur. Il manque de fonds pour augmenter son stock c’est pour cela, il sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en: Father to 3 children of whom 1 goes to school, Tchamié is a young 27 year old man. To fulfill his role as father, he generates income by selling motor oil. He lacks funds to increase his stock. Because of this, he is requesting a first loan from WAGES. He wants to reinvest in his business and ensure the self-fulfillment of his family.

loans.use: to buy motor oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy general foodstuffs to resell.

loans.name: Mahukpego Group

texts.fr: MAHUKPEGO est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Clémentine (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 37 ans et est mariée à un certain Clément. Le couple a deux enfants dont un est scolarisé et tous à leur charge. Clémentine et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants et assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Clémentine n’a jamais été l’école. Il y a près de vingt ans que Clémentine mène comme activité la vente de divers produits à son domicile. Clémentine exerce cette activité passionnément, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Clémentine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Clémentine sollicite un quatrième crédit avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUKPEGO. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
MAHUKPEGO is a group of three people, whose members live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Clémentine (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 37 years old and is married to a certain Clément. 

The couple has two children of whom one goes to school and all are under their care. Clémentine and her husband live together with their children and take care of the different household responsibilities together. Clémentine never went to school.

For almost 20 years Clémentine has been managing a business selling diverse products from her home. Clémentine practices this business with passion, which allows her to meet her needs and those of her children. Clémentine gets her supplies in a market in Bénin. 

Seeking to satisfy her clientèle, Clémentine is requesting a fourth loan with the other members of the MAHUKPEGO group. This loan will help them to better respond to the demands of their clientèle and to make more profits. The previous loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy diverse products.

loans.name: Sophorn

texts.en:
Sophorn is 31 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. Sophorn has been working in a garment factory for more than two years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $2 per day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sophorn is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase farmland for cultivating cassava. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and help her children get their higher education. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase farmland for cultivating cassava

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en: Miriam, 52 years old, is married and has three children. She has operated a grocery for eight years and she also farms to generate more income. Through Faulu Kenya, Miriam has managed to grow her business. She has also been trained in financial management, which has helped her to handle her finances by saving. Miriam desires to open a wholesale grocery in the future. She needs a loan of 20,000 KES to increase her stock of sweet potatoes, potatoes and bananas.

loans.use: To increase her stock of sweet potatoes, potatoes and bananas

loans.name: Mahuena Sourou A Group

texts.fr: MAHUENA SOUROU A est un groupe de cinq personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, Henriette Caritas Baï (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 50 ans et est une veuve. Henriette Caritas Baï est mère de deux enfants, qui ne sont plus à sa charge. Henriette Caritas Baï vit seule et assure seule ses différents besoins. Henriette Caritas Baï a très peu fréquenté l'école. Il y a une quinzaine d'année, Henriette Caritas Baï mène comme activité la vente de divers produits (savons, sacs, tissus, fournitures scolaires, etc.) par le système de distribution ; ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins. Henriette Caritas Baï s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Henriette Caritas Baï sollicite un quatrième crédit avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUENA SOUROU A. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en: Mahuena Sourou A is a group of five individuals living in the same neighborhood of Benin. The group’s representative, Henriette Caritas Bai (the one raising her hand in the photo) is 50 years old and a window. Henriette Caritas Bai has two children, who are self-supporting. She lives alone and provides for herself. Henriette Caritas Bai has had very little formal schooling.  For about 15 years, Henriette Carita Bai has been selling miscellaneous items (soap, bags, fabric, school supplies, etc) through a distribution system, which allows her to support herself. She stocks up in a town of Benin. With the goal of customer satisfaction, Henriette Caritas Bai, along with the other members of the Mahuena Sourou A group, is seeking a fourth loan. This loan will allow the group members to better meet  demand and  increase their profits.

loans.use: to buy boxes of soap, fabric, bags and school supplies.

loans.name: Selia

texts.en:
Selia is a 32-year-old farmer in Nkubu County, Kenya, where she lives with her two children, both in school, She has been farming for three years, producing milk, fruits and vegetables which she sells locally. Selia's main challenges are pest and diseases.

Selia is requesting a loan of 30,000 KES to buy water tanks and pipes for irrigating her produce due to poor weather. This will help her increase her production, boost her standard of living and allow her to pay school fees for her children. Selia plans to open a cereal store in the future for additional income. Selia says that Juhudi Kilimo is the best microfinance institution for small scale farmers.

loans.use: To buy water tanks and pipes for irrigation

loans.name: Cristofer Francisco

texts.es: El joven Cristofer de 21 años de edad empezó a laborar a los 18, su actual empleo es de educación de adultos con 12 horas laborales a la semana, es estudiante de la carrera de licenciatura de psicología clínica, ha costeado sus estudios con el apoyo de sus padres y el de el propio, pero no es lo suficiente para poder cubrir el costo de un solo el curso de titulación, es por eso que acude a solicitar crédito para poder pagar su curso ya que de lo contrario tendría que esperar hasta el próximo año, su carrera es muy importante para el por qué le gusta ayudar a las personas, escucharlas y entenderlas. Cristofer agradece mucho el apoyo que le brinden ya que con esto les están permitiendo a jóvenes de bajos recursos a realizarse.
texts.en: Young Cristofer, 21, started to work at the age of 18.  He currently works in adult education for about 12 hours weekly.  He’s also a a Bachelor's Degree student majoring in clinical psychology.  He’s paid for his studies himself and with help from his parents but it’s not sufficient to cover a single final course which is why he’s asking for a loan to pay for this course.  Otherwise, he’ll have to wait until next year.  His career is very important to him because he likes helping people, to listen to them and understand them.  Cristofer is very grateful for the support provided because you are helping young people of limited resources to fulfill their dreams.

loans.use: to pay for his final course.

loans.name: Yim

texts.en:
Yim (in the photo) raises pigs and produces rice wine. She is now a widow because her husband just passed away. She has five daughters; three are married. Yim lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh.

She is applying for a loan of $1,000 to buy pig feed; this will assist her pig farming business.

loans.use: to buy pig feed to assist her pig farming business.

loans.name: Douglas Antonio

texts.es: El joven Douglas de 22 años de edad estudiante de la carrera de licenciatura en contaduría pública y finanzas, labora para una empresa privada como auxiliar contable, salario que no le da para cubrir su curso de titulación ya que este es su último año como estudiante universitario, el solicita apoyo de crédito para cubrir con el costo del título, de no ser posible este préstamo tendría que atrasarse un año para poder ahorrar para el pago de su curso; su profesión es muy importante para el por que se irá desarrollando como un profesional y podrá ayudar a las personas que lo necesiten.
texts.en: Young Douglas, 22, is a Bachelor’s Degree student majoring in public accounting and finance.  He’s employed in a private firm as an accounting aide.  His salary is insufficient to cover costs for his final course; he’s in his final year of university.  He’s looking for support from a loan to cover the cost of this course.  If the loan were not possible, he’ll be delayed a year while he saves up enough to pay for the course.  His profession is very important to him because he will develop as a professional and will be able to help people who need him.

loans.use: to pay for his final course.

loans.name: Rodolfo Antonio

texts.es: Rodolfo Antonio vive junto a sus padres, el posee un cibercafé y una fotocopiadora, tiene varios años de poseer el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,  esta ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico cerca de una escuela,  los estudiantes son sus mejores clientes, todas las personas lo prefieren por los buenos precios, y por la calidad del buen servicio, Rodolfo es un  hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y con muchas ganas de salir adelante día a día busca las mejores alternativas le den la oportunidad de llegar al éxito, en estos últimos meses han aumentado los clientes y como todo buen comerciante quiere extender el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión en mejoras de activos, pero para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicito a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar repuestas de computadora y mantenimiento del lugar. Rodolfo Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rodolfo Antonio lives with his parents.  He has an Internet access café and a photocopier.  He’s had the business for several years and he’s gained much experience that makes it possible for him to earn higher profits.  He’s located in a very strategic spot near a school; the students are his best customers.  Everyone prefers him because of his good prices and for the quality of his good service.  

Rodolfo is an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work and who very much wants to get ahead.  Every day he seeks better alternatives that will provide opportunities for him to reach success.  In recent months his clientele has grown and like any good merchant he wants to expand the business and invest in new assets.  But to do so he needs capital which is why he’s asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy computer spare parts and for maintenance of the site.  Rodolfo Antonio has good payment references and impeccable morals.  He’s sure to repay the loan and at the same time trusts that he will provide his family with a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy computer spare parts and for service.

loans.name: Srey Touch

texts.en:
Srey Touch is 38 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and selling groceries for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her husband is a construction foreman. He earns about $10 each day. 

In order to improve her husband’s business, Srey Touch is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase construction materials for her husband to build a flat for his client. This money will help him have enough materials for the construction. 

In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to earn higher education.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for her husband to build a flat for his client.

loans.name: Mbodze

texts.en:
Mbodze, 45, lives with her life partner and six children. She earns a living through the door-to-door sale of dumplings to the neighbors.  She’s been in business for five years, and has acquired much experience that leads her to earn higher profits. She has quite a few regular customers because people know that everything she sells is of top quality and at affordable prices; in addition, her service is excellent.

Mbodze is an enterprising woman who has many future goals. She wants to earn a better living and is working hard to do so because she knows that’s the only way to reach success. 

Like all good merchants, she wants to increase business but needs capital to back her up. This is why she’s asking Yehu for a loan to buy ingredients like wheat flour, cooking oil, baking powder, etc. 

She’s confident that she’ll be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like wheat flour, cooking oil, baking powder, etc to make dumplings for resale.

loans.name: Consolata

texts.en:
Consolata sells fish, and has been in her business for the past four years with very good income.

This is her second term loan with KADET LTD.  She paid her previous loan well, and in good time.  She will use this loan amount to purchase more stock of fish for resale.

She hopes to own a permanent structure to do her business.

loans.use: to add more stock of fish for resale.

loans.name: Ernest

texts.en: Ernest, who is a farmer, used his previous loan to buy more chicks for his farm.  The chicks matured and later produced eggs from which he made good profits; he used the additional income to buy chicks' mash. Ernest has requested another loan of 35,000 KES to buy more chicks and animal feeds.

loans.use: to buy chicks.

loans.name: Fausto Edgardo

texts.es: Fausto Edgardo de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo; Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas; el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a precios accesible y con un excelente servicio; Fausto es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le permitan encontrar el camino para un futuro mas prospero sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse, realizara una nueva inversión y para ello le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Fausto Edgardo tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Fausto Edgardo, 43, lives with his life companion and their son.  He grows corn and beans and has worked in this occupation for several years which has provided him with valuable experience that makes it possible for him to obtain the best harvests.  His farmland is located in an area with high agricultural activity that’s very near to where he lives.  He sells in all surrounding areas and has a large clientele that prefers him because everything he sells is top quality, prices are affordable and service is excellent.

Fausto is an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work.  He’s always looking for alternatives that will make it possible for him to find the road towards a more prosperous future; he knows this is the only way to attain success.  

He experienced some losses in the previous growing season and wants to recuperate.  He will make a new investment and needs a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, herbicide, etc. to do so.  Fausto Edgardo has good payment references and is sure that he will be able to repay the loan while trusting that he will be able to provide economic security for his home.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide and herbicide.

loans.name: Elizabeth De Los Angeles

texts.es: Elizabeth de 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos muy alegres y dedicados a sus estudios. Elizabeth trabaja como costurera en su casa de habitación elaborando ropa para hombres mujeres y niños, mucha de esta ropa se hace por encargos previos pero también ella elabora trajes, faldas y otros más para comercializar y de esta forma obtener ganancias extras. Elizabeth solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar telas en diferentes colores, con distintos estampados y estilos para elaborar más prendas de vestir, sobre todo para esta temporada de fin de año que se acerca, para poder estar muy equipada con ropa para ofrecer a las personas.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 39, lives with her husband and three very cheerful children who are dedicated to their studies.  Elizabeth works as a seamstress at home making clothes for men, women and children.  Much of the work she does is to order but she also makes suits, skirts and others to sell and earn extra money this way.

Elizabeth is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to buy fabric in assorted colors with various prints and styles to make more articles of clothing, especially for this upcoming end-of-year season so that she can be well-stocked with clothes to sell to people.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Francisca Guadalupe

texts.es: Francisca de 31 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y un hijo de 4 años de edad. Ella siempre ha sido una madre muy responsable quien se esfuerza mucho para salir adelante. Francisca se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y productos para el cuidado de la piel, un negocio que ha sido muy positivo para ella ya que así pueda brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo con todos los gastos de su hogar. Francisca solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar cosméticos, cremas para el cabello y el cuerpo y el cabello, esmaltes, perfumes y otros más. Lo que ella desea es aumentar sus ventas y de esta forma contar con una mejor economía en su hogar.
texts.en: Francisca is 31 years old and lives with her husband and 4 year-old son. She has always been a very responsible mother who works very hard to get ahead. Francisca devotes herself to selling cosmetics and skin care products, a line of business that has turned out to be very positive for her, as well as being able to provide the necessary assistance to her husband with all the household expenses.  Francisca requests a loan from INTEGRAL, through which she will buy cosmetics, creams and lotions for body and hair, nail polish, perfume and more. What she seeks is to increase her sales and thus create a better economic situation at home.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Doris

texts.en:
Doris is a thirty-two-year-old farmer in Nkubu County in Kenya, where she lives with her child of three years who is attending school. She has been in farming for four years, producing fruits and vegetables which she sells at the local market. She operates a bar as an additional source of income.

She is requesting 40,000 KES to help her construct a cereal store, which will help her to get an extra income that will boost her standard of living and also pay for her child's school fees. She as well aspires to be exporting her products to other countries in the future.

Lack of readily available market for her products; also pests and diseases are some of the challenges she is facing.

Doris says that Juhudi Kilimo is doing a great job to help small-scale farmers.

loans.use: to buy materials for building a cereal store.

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
This is Ligaya, a 43-year-old resident of Bacoor, Cavite City, Philippines who is married to Jovencio and a mother to her children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Ligaya operates a market stall selling fruits and vegetable products by the kilo in the community market. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community, and she earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 50,000 loan to buy more quantities of fruits and vegetables to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.

Ligaya dreams of giving a good quality education to her children, and hopes to have a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for vegetables and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Jenniffer Auricela

texts.es: Jennifer de 21 años de edad, es una joven ejemplar, alegre y trabajadora, se dedica a estudiar derecho en la universidad. Vive únicamente junto a su abuela y para salir adelante se dedican a la venta de edredones y cubrecamas los cuales comercializan en parques, oficinas y diferentes pueblos. Jennifer cuenta con grandes deseos de superarse por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar más variedad de ropa de cama ya que su negocio ha ido creciendo al igual que la demanda, el mayor deseo de Jennifer en surtir su negocio y ganar más para seguir pagando sus estudios y así mismo contar con todo lo necesario en su hogar.
texts.en: Jennifer, 21, is an exemplary young woman; she’s cheerful and hardworking.  She is studying law in the university.  She lives just with her grandmother and in order to get ahead they sell comforters and bedspreads in parks, offices and various towns.  Jennifer very much wants to improve which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy a wider variety of bed linens because her business has been growing as well as demand and Jennifer’s greatest wish is to stock her business and earn more to be able to continue paying for her studies as well as having everything needed at home.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads to sell.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 61 años de edad, es una señora muy responsable y puntual, vive junto a su esposo quien se dedica a trabajar. Teresa posee una venta de tortillas en su casa de habitación en donde también vende pupusas y bebidas frías y calientes. Con el deseo de aumentar sus ventas para bien de su hogar y su economía ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar toda la materia prima por mayor, ya que de esta manera podrá obtenerla a precios más bajos lo que le garantizará mayores ganancias.  Teresa es una persona que goza de muchas referencias positivas ya que siempre se esfuerza por salir adelante.
texts.en: Teresa, 61, is a very responsible, punctual lady.  She lives with her husband who works.  Teresa sells tortillas at home and also sells pupusas [filled, grilled corncakes] and hot and cold beverages.  Wanting to increase sales for her home’s wellbeing and economy, she’s requesting a loan to buy all the raw materials at wholesale so that she can get them at lower prices thus insuring higher profits.  Teresa is a person with very positive references because she always strives to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make pupusas.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
This is Emma. She previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help to sustain her family’s daily needs and her children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Emma hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams to be able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Annastacia

texts.en:
Annastacia is a thirty-eight-year-old farmer in Nkubu County, Kenya. She is widowed, and lives with three of her children, all of whom are in school. She has been farming for seven years, producing milk, and growing fruits and vegetables, which she sells at the local market.  Annastacia is employed, which helps her get an additional source of income.

She is requesting 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase dairy goats.  This will help her get more income, and will be of great help to her since she will be able to pay school fees for her children. She aspires to buy an extra piece of land that will help her increase her produce in the future.

Unreliable weather conditions, pests and diseases are her major challenges.

Annastacia says Juhudi Kilimo is doing a great job with small-scale farmers.

loans.use: to buy dairy goats to produce milk to sell.

loans.name: Andrian

texts.en:
Andrian is a 40-year-old farmer from Nkubu County in Kenya, where he lives with his wife and three children, of whom two are schooling. He has been in farming for the past fifteen years, producing bananas and fruits which he supplies to a board. He also operates a hotel as an additional source of living.

He is requesting 42,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow, which will help him get extra income that will help him educate his children. He aspires to open a cereal shop in the future.

Pests, diseases, and crop failure are some of the challenges Andrian faces.

Andrian says Juhudi Kilimo is the best microfinance institution for small-scale farmers.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es: Carlos Alfredo de veintidós años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su madre, él se dedica a la venta de juguetes carritos, rompecabezas, muñecos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener buenas ganancias, comercia de forma ambulante y también le vende a diferentes locales de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela fija que lo prefiere porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad y a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; Carlos es un hombre dedicado a su labor, muy activo y luchador siempre esta en la búsqueda de oportunidades que le permitan encontrar el camino al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar juguetes por mayor. Carlos Alfredo tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor y más completa.
texts.en:
Carlos Alfredo, 22, lives with his life companion and his mother.  He sells toys: cars, jigsaw puzzles and dolls, among others.  He’s been in business several years and has much sales experience that allows him to earn good profits.  He sells from place to place and also sells to various locales in the community.  He has quite a few regular customers who prefer him because everything he sells is quality at affordable prices and service is excellent.

Carlos is a man who is dedicated to his work; he’s very active and tenacious and is always looking for opportunities that will allow him to find the road to success.  In recent weeks, demand has increased and he wants to take advantage of it and make a new investment but lacks sufficient capital which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy toys at wholesale.
